data.text:
BookBuddy is a powerful book management app that gives you access to your entire book catalog, anywhere. Using BookBuddy is fun and easy, allowing you to quickly find any book in your library, share your favorite books, and keep track of borrowed and lent books.

FREE VERSION

- BookBuddy has all the features of BookBuddy Pro with a 50 book limit.

- BookBuddy can be upgraded via In-App Purchase for unlimited book storage.

KEY FEATURES

â¢ Adding Your Books

Add your books using the following options:

- Scan barcode

- Enter ISBN

- Search online by keyword

- Add manually

- Import from CSV file

â¢ Organizing Your Books

Place your books where they belong:

- My Books â books you own

- Wish List â books you wish to own

- Borrowed â books you borrowed from others

- Previously Owned â books you no longer own

â¢ Syncing Your Library

Sync your library across multiple devices using iCloud or Dropbox sync.

â¢ Sharing Your Library

Share your library online via the BookBuddy Companion website and invite anyone to view it (requires a monthly subscription).

â¢Â Unlocking Your Reading Insights

Deep dive into your reading habits by exploring the following statistics:

- Books Finished â Track the number of books youâve completed

- Pages Read â See your page count over time

- Top Authors â Discover your most-read authors

- Favorite Genres â Identify your preferred genres

MORE TO LOVE

â¢ Universal app â pay once and use BookBuddy on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Silicon Mac.

â¢ Personalize â use categories and tags, mark favorites, add personal notes, and much more.

â¢ Appearance â choose either list or grid view to best match your needs.

â¢ Custom Filters â filter your library by multiple criteria.

â¢ Advanced Sorting â apply multi-level data sorting.

â¢ Loans â instantly track books that are currently loaned out.

â¢ Multiple selection â apply batch operations using multiple selection.

â¢ Reading Status â filter your books by their reading status.

â¢ Quick find â instantly find books by entering search keywords or scanning their barcodes.

â¢ Export â quickly export your library into CSV, PDF, or HTML formats.

â¢ Print â easily print selected books to AirPrint-enabled printers.

â¢ Backup â create backups to any cloud service.

â¢ Activity History â view the full history of your reading and loaning activities.

â¢ Duplicates â quickly detect duplicates and easily remove them.

â¢ Privacy â your library is saved locally and privately on your device.

â¢ And so much more!

CLASSROOM LIBRARY MANAGER (for teachers)

â¢ Manage â use BookBuddy to manage your classroom library and track student checkouts.

â¢ Checkout History â easily track checkout history and view statistics.

â¢ Contacts â save your student names in BookBuddy Contacts rather than in your personal Contacts app.

â¢ Reading Level Fields â use various fields to track the reading level of your books.

â¢ Online Sharing â allow students to self-checkout books via the BookBuddy Companion website (requires a monthly subscription).
